org.example

Class Communication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.Communication

  • public class Communication
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to describe HTTP communication model between services of the system.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        protected static java.lang.String put(java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String serviceName,
                                      java.lang.String serviceURI,
                                      int serverPort,
                                      java.lang.String getMapping,
                                      java.lang.String putMapping,
                                      java.lang.String groupID,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      org.json.JSONObject values,
                                      org.json.JSONObject wanted,
                                      org.json.JSONArray workspaces,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isSensor)
                               throws kong.unirest.UnirestException
        Function to process the PUT request building the JSONObject
        Parameters:
        url - Decision Service's url: the target of PUT message,
        serviceName - Service name;
        serviceURI - http address of the actual service;
        serverPort - port listening at "serviceURI" address;
        getMapping - GET functions list to use with this service to execute a data request. Optional;
        putMapping - PUT functions list of this service. Optional;
        groupID - service belonging group;
        description - general info; Optional; Avoid punctuation;
        values - Actual measured values;
        wanted - target value suggested;
        workspaces - used to get a evaluation from Decision Service;
        isSensor - true if service is a sensor, false if it is an actuator;
        Returns:
        TO services: Decision Service resends the received message, TO ACTUATOR: return a JSONObject with result of workspace evaluation
        Throws:
        kong.unirest.UnirestException - threw with connection problems;

      • registerNewType

        protected static java.lang.String registerNewType(java.lang.String type,
                                                  java.lang.String url)
        Parameters:
        type - name of new type of data;
        url - http address of Decision Service;
        Returns:
        answer of Decision Service;

      • sendJSONObject

        private static java.lang.String sendJSONObject(org.json.JSONObject msg,
                                               java.lang.String url)
        Internal service function to execute a HTTP PUT request on a target URL
        Parameters:
        msg - JSONObject to send
        url - target address
        Returns:
        body of the PUT response message
